name: Toss Titans (cjabs)
description:
Submission for the 2020 DK30 hosted by Day[9].  Theme: Two is Better Than One

Pickup, toss, and swap between two Vaudeville Strongmen to cover great distances and navigate high-flying levels. Collect pages to unlock more abilities such as turning into ice to break through obstacles. Compatible with both controller and mouse & keyboard.

Controls (Xbox Controller):

WASD or Left Analog Stick - Move/Aim Toss

Q or Y - Swap Characters

Space  or A - Jump

E or X - Hold to grab then release to toss

Escape - Quit
